question: The bird ancestor that lived in trees developed what feature commonly associated with birds?

nodes.text: Tails are a feature developed by the bird ancestor that lived in trees.
Webbed feet are a feature developed by the bird ancestor that lived in trees.
Beaks are a feature developed by the bird ancestor that lived in trees.
Wings developed in the tree-dwelling bird ancestor.
